about_the_game:
The main hero of the game is a druid who is looking for a teacher to gain wisdom, but his way lays through the magic forest that contains a lot of obstacles and riddles.
You have to collect magic runes that gives you different abilities, solve puzzles and help forest dwellers to find your teacher.

Features

  • Magic forest atmosphere;
  • Stylized graphics;
  • Big set of different abilities;
  • Large number of interesting puzzles.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x32 & x64 with support OpenGL 3.2
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel

  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Druid is an adventure game with different puzzles and riddles where you play as a druid who searches for a wise master and helps to magic forest dwellers. Overcome all obstacles to find your teacher!
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Hungarian, Turkish
